DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this post-marketing surveillance, conducted in Japan, is to know the frequency, type and degree of device malfunction, to assure the safety of the medical device, and to collect information on evaluation of the efficacy and safety.
DOC.brief_title: XIENCE V/PROMUS Everolimus-Eluting Stent System Post-marketing Surveillance Protocol for Japan
DOC.detailed_description: The surveillance is to be conducted in accordance with the Japanese Ministerial Ordinance concerning the Standards for Postmarketing Surveillance and Tests of Medical Devices.
DOC.criteria: Only XIENCE V stent(s)or PROMUS stent(s) is (are) implanted in the coronary vasculature during the index procedure. Neither XIENCE V stent(s) nor PROMUS stent(s) is (are) implanted in the coronary vasculature during the index procedure.
